ticket_text: My internet connection keeps dropping every few minutes. This has been happening for the past 3 days. Very frustrating!
I would like to know about the different pricing plans available for business customers. Please send me detailed information.
Cannot access my email account. Password reset link is not working. Need urgent help!
Thank you for resolving my billing issue so quickly! Your support team is amazing. Great service!
The software crashes whenever I try to export data to Excel. This is blocking my work completely.
I'm interested in upgrading my current plan. What are the available options and pricing?
Your service has been terrible lately. Multiple outages and no communication. Very disappointed.
How do I change my account settings? The interface is not very intuitive. Need some guidance.
Billing error on my last invoice. I was charged twice for the same service. Please fix this immediately.
Just wanted to say thanks for the excellent customer support. My issue was resolved within hours!
The mobile app is not syncing with the web version. Lost important data. This is unacceptable!
Can someone explain the difference between your premium and enterprise plans? Need details on features.
System is running very slow since the last update. Takes forever to load. Please help.
I received a promotional email about discounts. How can I apply this to my account?
Account has been locked for no reason. Cannot login. Need immediate assistance!
Your team helped me migrate all my data smoothly. Professional and efficient service. Highly recommend!
Payment method on file is not working. Cannot update credit card information. Getting error messages.
Interested in scheduling a demo of your enterprise solution for our team. What's the process?
The new update broke several features I regularly use. Very frustrated with this release.
Where can I find documentation on API integration? Need technical specifications and examples.
Your support representative was rude and unhelpful. Terrible customer service experience!
Reports are not generating correctly. Numbers don't match. This is affecting our business decisions.
What are the system requirements for your software? Planning to deploy across multiple workstations.
Refund request for cancelled service. Still waiting after 2 weeks. This is taking too long!
Just upgraded to premium plan. Everything works great! Very satisfied with the features.
Cannot connect to VPN. Getting authentication errors. Need to access system remotely for work.
Do you offer volume discounts for multiple licenses? Looking to purchase for entire department.
Dashboard widgets are not displaying data. Everything shows zero. Tried refreshing multiple times.
Received wrong product in my order. Need replacement or refund. Order number #12345.
The training materials you provided were very helpful. Team is now fully onboarded. Thank you!
Security concerns about recent data breach reports. What measures are in place to protect customer data?
Need information about contract renewal terms. Current contract expires next month.
Automated backups are failing. Cannot restore previous versions. Critical business data at risk!
How do I cancel my subscription? Cannot find the option in account settings.
Love the new features in the latest update! Interface is much more user-friendly now.
Integration with third-party tools is not working. API returns error codes. Need developer assistance.
Interested in partnership opportunities. Would like to discuss reseller program details.
Print function is broken. Documents are corrupted when printed. Tried different printers, same issue.
Charged for services I didn't use. Invoice shows incorrect usage metrics. Need detailed breakdown.
Your product has exceeded our expectations. ROI has been fantastic. Will definitely renew!
Two-factor authentication is not working. Not receiving verification codes. Cannot access account!
Can you provide case studies of similar companies using your solution? Need for internal presentation.
Search functionality is terrible. Cannot find anything. Results are irrelevant and incomplete.
Shipping was delayed by 2 weeks. No tracking updates. Poor logistics management.
Impressed by the quick response time. Issue resolved on first contact. Excellent support!
File uploads are timing out for large files. Maximum size limit is too restrictive for our needs.
What training options are available for new users? Do you offer on-site training sessions?
Custom fields are not saving data. Form validation errors everywhere. System is unusable!
Duplicate charges on my credit card. Was billed three times this month. Fix this now!
Migration from old system was seamless. Data integrity maintained. Great job by technical team!
Notifications are not being sent. Email alerts completely stopped working yesterday.
Looking for white-label solutions. Can your platform be customized with our branding?
Performance degradation during peak hours. System becomes unresponsive. Affecting productivity.
Unclear about data retention policies. How long is customer data stored? Need compliance information.
Support ticket was closed without resolution. Issue still persists. Reopening for proper fix!
Export functionality works perfectly now after the fix. Thanks for the prompt resolution!
Mobile app crashes on startup. Cannot access account from phone. Only happens on iOS devices.
Interested in annual payment option. Do you offer discounts for yearly subscriptions?
Attachments are not uploading. File size is within limits. Browser console shows JavaScript errors.
Received damaged goods. Packaging was inadequate. Request return authorization immediately.
Onboarding process was smooth and well-organized. Appreciate the dedicated account manager!
SSL certificate expired. Website showing security warnings. This looks very unprofessional!
Can we schedule a call to discuss enterprise pricing? Have specific requirements to discuss.
Calendar sync is broken. Events not updating across devices. Missing important meetings!
Promotional discount code is not applying at checkout. Shows as invalid. Code is still valid!
Product quality is outstanding. Exactly what we needed. Will be ordering more soon!
Database connection errors since maintenance window. Application completely down for users.
What are the cancellation terms? Need to understand early termination fees before committing.
Keyboard shortcuts are not working. Have to use mouse for everything. Very inefficient workflow.
Account was suspended without warning. No explanation provided. Need immediate reactivation!
Feature request was implemented quickly. Love how you listen to customer feedback!
Memory leak in the application. System gets slower over time. Need to restart every few hours.
Considering upgrade to enterprise plan. What additional features would we get?
Sorting and filtering options are limited. Cannot organize data effectively. Need more flexibility.
Wrong product delivered. Ordered Model A but received Model B. Shipping department error.
Customer support went above and beyond to help. Truly exceptional service experience!
Authentication tokens expiring too quickly. Have to login constantly. Very annoying!
Need detailed comparison between your product and competitors. Evaluating options for purchase.
UI is confusing and cluttered. Poor user experience design. Needs complete redesign.
Automatic renewal charged without notification. Want to cancel and get refund for this period.
Beta testing program has been great. Love being involved in product development!
Critical bug in production. Data loss occurring. Need emergency hotfix deployed immediately!
Do you have government or education pricing? Non-profit organization seeking discounts.
Drag and drop functionality is buggy. Items disappear or duplicate randomly. Unreliable feature.
Package arrived with missing items. Only received partial order. Need remaining items shipped.
Switching from competitor was best decision. Your platform is far superior. Happy customer!
LDAP integration failing. Cannot sync user directory. Authentication not working for entire team!
Interested in pilot program. Can we trial the enterprise features before full commitment?
Charts and graphs rendering incorrectly. Data visualization is broken. Shows wrong values.
Overcharged by significant amount. Invoice total doesn't match agreed pricing. Accounting error.
Premium support subscription is worth every penny. Instant help whenever needed!
Webhook notifications stopped working. No events being received. Integration completely broken!
What payment methods do you accept? Need to use purchase order for procurement process.
Undo function is unreliable. Sometimes works, sometimes doesn't. Lost work multiple times.
Return process was complicated and took forever. Customer service was unhelpful throughout.
Referral program benefits are excellent. Appreciate the rewards for recommendations!
Server timeouts during data synchronization. Large datasets failing to upload completely.
Can we get a custom quote for our specific needs? Standard plans don't quite fit requirements.
Mobile responsive design is poor. Layout breaks on tablets. Unusable on smaller screens.
Still waiting for refund promised 3 weeks ago. Multiple follow-ups ignored. Unacceptable delay!
Platform stability has been rock solid. Zero downtime in past 6 months. Impressive!
Backup restoration process failed. Cannot recover deleted files. Critical data permanently lost!
Looking to migrate from current provider. What does your migration assistance include?
Timezone handling is completely broken. All timestamps showing incorrect times. Major issue.
Product doesn't match description on website. Misleading marketing information. Very disappointing.
Account manager is proactive and helpful. Always available when we need assistance!
Single sign-on not working with our identity provider. Configuration steps unclear and incomplete.
Need bulk licensing options. Planning deployment for 500+ users across organization.
Accessibility features are inadequate. Screen reader compatibility is poor. Not WCAG compliant.
Charged annual fee despite requesting cancellation last month. Want immediate refund!
Documentation is comprehensive and well-written. Easy to find answers. Great resources!
Concurrent user limits causing lockouts. Team cannot work simultaneously. Need license upgrade immediately!
Interested in add-on modules. What additional functionality can be purchased separately?
Copy-paste functionality broken in text editor. Formatting gets corrupted. Basic feature not working!
Delivery was late and no one notified me. Had to contact support multiple times for update.
Loyalty rewards program is generous. Accumulated points quickly. Great incentive!
API rate limits are too restrictive. Cannot complete necessary operations. Blocking business processes!
What certifications does your platform have? Need SOC2 and ISO compliance documentation.
Permission system is too granular. Cannot assign roles efficiently. Overly complicated setup.
Received defective item. Quality control failure. Expecting replacement and compensation.
Renewal process was straightforward. Transparent pricing. No hidden fees. Appreciate honesty!
Encryption at rest not working. Sensitive data stored in plain text. Major security vulnerability!
Do you offer month-to-month contracts? Don't want long-term commitment initially.
Import wizard crashes with large CSV files. Cannot migrate existing data. Blocking onboarding!
Subscription auto-renewed at higher price without notice. Should have been grandfathered in!
Product updates are released regularly. Continuous improvement visible. Active development!
Race condition in concurrent processing. Data corruption occurring. Critical production bug!
Looking for partnership to resell your services. What are commission rates?
Spell check not working. Auto-correct suggestions are terrible. Basic functionality missing.
Package was left in rain and contents damaged. Poor delivery handling. Unacceptable!
Community forum is active and helpful. Found solutions faster than waiting for support!
Load balancer failing over incorrectly. Sessions being dropped. High availability not working!
Need implementation services. Can your team help with initial setup and configuration?
Multi-language support is incomplete. Translations are poor quality. Many strings still in English.
Promised features are missing from purchased plan. Feels like false advertising!
Upgrade path was seamless. No data loss or downtime. Professional execution!
Audit logs not capturing all events. Compliance requirement not being met. Serious issue!
Can we get references from similar customers? Want to hear about real experiences.
Dark mode is poorly implemented. Contrast is bad. Hard to read. Eye strain issues.
Return label not provided. Have to pay shipping costs myself. Should be prepaid!
Knowledge base articles are detailed and accurate. Self-service support is excellent!
Automated tests failing after platform update. Breaking our CI/CD pipeline. Blocking deployments!
Interested in extended trial period. Need more time to evaluate all features thoroughly.
Session timeout too aggressive. Getting logged out constantly while working. Productivity killer!
Billing statement is confusing. Line items unclear. Need itemized breakdown explanation.
SLA commitments consistently exceeded. Reliability has been exceptional. Worth the investment!
Data export stuck in processing. Cannot download reports. Been waiting for hours!
What's included in professional services package? Need hands-on implementation help.
Browser back button breaks application state. Have to reload page. Poor navigation handling.
Received wrong size/color. Order fulfillment mistake. Need correct item shipped ASAP.
Beta features are innovative. Excited about product roadmap. Great vision!
Disaster recovery procedures untested. Backup system never verified. Compliance risk!
Looking for non-profit discount. Educational institution with limited budget.
Infinite scroll not working. Page freezes when loading more items. Performance issue.
Price increase notification came too late. Already budgeted at old rates. Unfair timing!
Customer success team is outstanding. Regular check-ins ensure we're getting maximum value!
Monitoring alerts not triggering. System failures going undetected. Alerting system broken!
Can you provide ROI calculator? Need to justify investment to management.
Auto-save functionality unreliable. Lost hours of work. Critical feature not dependable!
Warranty claim rejected unfairly. Product clearly defective. Poor after-sales support!
Training webinars are informative and well-presented. Great for team onboarding!
Memory consumption keeps growing. Application eating all available RAM. Memory leak!
Exploring strategic partnership opportunities. Our services complement each other well.
Localization is broken. Date/time formats incorrect for region. Currency symbols wrong.
Credit not applied to account as promised. Billing department not honoring commitment!
